original_text: In the time of Herod king of Judea there was a priest named Zechariah, who belonged to the priestly division of Abijah; his wife Elizabeth was also a descendant of Aaron.
korean_text: 유대 왕 헤롯 때에 아비야 반열에 제사장 한 사람이 있었으니 이름은 사가랴요 그의 아내는 아론의 자손이니 이름은 엘리사벳이라

sentences.original_text: In the time of Herod king of Judea
there was a priest named Zechariah
who belonged to the priestly division of Abijah
his wife Elizabeth was also a descendant of Aaron
